EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal Partner Days_2017.Denver_SystemIntReminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you Thursday, April 13 at Pivotal Partner Days, Denver!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend Pivotal Partner Days taking place in Denver.
Below you will find some helpful information about the event:
Location: Galvanize Platte 1644 Platte St, Denver, CO 80202 Map & Directions <[[https://goo.gl/maps/8G6xbUcnbmy]]>
Parking and Building Access: Parking is located in Commons Park West.
Upon arrival, take the elevator to the Lower Level of the building to check-in. The event will begin promptly at 11:00am. Please arrive 15 minutes early to check in.
Space is limited for this event, so if you are no longer able to attend, we ask that you kindly let us know so that we may fill your spot.
Questions? If you have any questions please contact Cameron Stewart at cstewart@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cstewart@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you then!
- Pivotal Partner Alliances Team
